Revision History

This is where you'll find any updates to the design guidelines for the Content Management System, Native app and Webapp. The table below will show the author, date/time and an explanation with a link to the section that has been updated.

Author Date/Time ^ Description Link
Melissa Keizer 21/06/2019 @ 17:22 Added new content to modals -
Melissa Keizer 12/06/2019 @ 14:08 Creation of Thrive Pattern Library -
Latest updates: 21/06/19 @ 17:23

If you think something has been missed or you would like to request it, please leave it as an issue in the GitHub repository. We (TheAppBuilder Design Team) want to continue to build on this Pattern Library and improve its usefulness to the whole team, so we welcome all feedback!

See the codebase View Github Repository ➞ Request a guide Create an issue ➞
